text: Casey's Shadow is a 1978 American family drama movie directed by Martin Ritt and based on the short story by John McPhee. It stars Walter Matthau, Alexis Smith, Murray Hamilton, Robert Webber, Andrew Rubin and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1978 drama movies Category:Family movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt
title: Casey's Shadow
